description.narrative:
To support its job creation programs, Mastercard is looking for expertise in the following areas: 1. Economic Researchers 2. Statisticians 3. Monitoring and Evaluation Support 4. Policy and Regulatory Framework Advisors 5. Education Consultants 6. TVET- Skills Consultants 7. Market Systems Facilitation/ Market Systems Development Consultants 8. MSME Finance Consultants 9. Impact Investing Consultants 10. Legal Consultants
It would like to begin by developing a database of individuals that includes the following 10 countries: Ghana, Kenya, Senegal, Ethiopia, Nigeria, Uganda, Malawi, South Africa, Morocco, and Rwanda.
